Uses of Package
com.dkriesel.snipe.core

Packages that use com.dkriesel.snipe.core
com.dkriesel.snipe.core Contains the two core classes of SNIPE - NeuralNetworkDescriptor, which you use to outline and create instances of Neural Networks, and the NeuralNetwork class itself; Both of those classes' documentations, and the package documentation as well contain fundamental information to get used to SNIPE. 
com.dkriesel.snipe.training Contains a class where to put in the training data for your neural network and one that contains several error measurement methods. 
com.dkriesel.snipe.util Contains some SNIPE utilities: A random number generator (which is not mine; see its class documentation for copyright information) and a class which generates DOT-Code of a neural net in order to visualize a neural net using GraphViz. 
 

Classes in com.dkriesel.snipe.core used by com.dkriesel.snipe.core
NeuralNetwork
          Instantiated second using a NeuralNetworkDescriptor instance, this class represents the core functionality of SNIPE: A neural network of arbitrary topology with a lightweight and calculation efficient data structure, the possibility to change the entire network topology as well as the synaptic weights and many other features; In the documentation of this class, detail information about the efficient data structure of the neural network is given, as well as information about its features.
NeuralNetworkDescriptor
          Read and instantiate first - A NeuralNetworkDescriptor object defines a set of high-level general parameters that are used to create a possibly large group of neural network instances; so first, you have to create a NeuralNetworkDescriptor, then use it to create as many neural network instances as you wish; moreover, some fundamental information about SNIPE usage is given in the documentation of this class.
 

Classes in com.dkriesel.snipe.core used by com.dkriesel.snipe.training
NeuralNetwork
          Instantiated second using a NeuralNetworkDescriptor instance, this class represents the core functionality of SNIPE: A neural network of arbitrary topology with a lightweight and calculation efficient data structure, the possibility to change the entire network topology as well as the synaptic weights and many other features; In the documentation of this class, detail information about the efficient data structure of the neural network is given, as well as information about its features.
 

Classes in com.dkriesel.snipe.core used by com.dkriesel.snipe.util
NeuralNetwork
          Instantiated second using a NeuralNetworkDescriptor instance, this class represents the core functionality of SNIPE: A neural network of arbitrary topology with a lightweight and calculation efficient data structure, the possibility to change the entire network topology as well as the synaptic weights and many other features; In the documentation of this class, detail information about the efficient data structure of the neural network is given, as well as information about its features.
